bibl.bibl: Steenis, Cornelis Gijsbert Gerrit Jan van, ed. 1950. Flora Malesiana: being an illustrated systematic account of the Malaysian flora. Volume 1 of Malaysian plant collectors and collections, being a cyclopaedia of botanical explorations in Malaysia and a guide to the concerned literature up to the year 1950. Ser. 1, Spermatophyta.
